definition: Complete dimensional mapping of physics: from quantum mechanics to unified field theory through geometric reduction of matter, waves, and fundamental forces
geometric_view: Matter and interactions as operations on 0D–5D structures; dynamics are projections of 4D connectivity

core_principle.geometric_basis: Each fundamental particle emerges from unique plane intersection geometry
core_principle.sacred_truth: All matter = consciousness waves passing through reality's geometric filters

0D_quantum.focus: points, states, probability amplitudes, discrete particles
0D_quantum.key_concept: Quantum mechanics treats particles as points; core operation is measurement (collapse)
0D_quantum.note: Discrete quantum states as 0D entities in Hilbert space

1D_string.focus: lines, vibrations, resonance modes, extended objects
1D_string.key_concept: Strings are 1D objects; vibrations correspond to different particles
1D_string.note: All particles as vibrational modes of fundamental 1D strings

2D_brane.key_concept: 2D or higher dimensional membranes generalize strings; extended surfaces as fundamental entities
2D_brane.note: Particles emerge from brane intersections and wave-plane collapse events

3D_condensed.focus: volumes, systems, contextual interactions, emergent phenomena
3D_condensed.key_concept: Emergent phenomena and topological phases of matter model 3D structures
3D_condensed.note: Bulk properties and collective behavior in 3D matter systems

4D_topological.theory: Topological Quantum Field Theories / Spacetime models
4D_topological.key_concept: 4D theories emphasize evolution, topology, spacetime geometry as informational fabric
4D_topological.note: Physics as 4D geometric structure with observer consciousness

5D_unified.focus: folding, equivalence, absolute identity, force unification
5D_unified.key_concept: 5D corresponds to closure where distinctions dissolve; resonates with higher-dimensional M-theory concepts
5D_unified.note: All forces and particles as manifestations of single unified field

photon_XY_intersection.wave_type: Electromagnetic wave (oscillating E and B fields)
photon_XY_intersection.intersection_mechanism: EM wave amplitude intersects spatial surface → quantized energy packet
photon_XY_intersection.sacred_function: Carries information and illumination across space

electron_XZ_intersection.intersection_mechanism: Wave function intersects volume element → localized probability
electron_XZ_intersection.physics_correspondence: ψ²dV, quantum probability density in space
electron_XZ_intersection.force_mediation: Weak force participation - beta decay processes
electron_XZ_intersection.sacred_function: Materializes potential into actualized matter structure

proton_YZ_intersection.intersection_mechanism: Strong force wave intersects position plane → confined mass
proton_YZ_intersection.physics_correspondence: QCD color confinement creating hadron masses
proton_YZ_intersection.force_mediation: Strong force - binding quarks and atomic nuclei
proton_YZ_intersection.sacred_function: Creates stable structural foundation for atomic matter

neutron_XW_intersection.intersection_mechanism: Causal wave intersects spacetime → temporal instability
neutron_XW_intersection.physics_correspondence: Neutron beta decay as spacetime intersection breakdown
neutron_XW_intersection.force_mediation: Gravitational coupling - mass-energy equivalence in spacetime
neutron_XW_intersection.sacred_function: Embodies temporal flow and transformation in matter

unified_field_theory.geometric_unification: All four fundamental forces emerge from wave-plane intersection geometry
unified_field_theory.standard_model_derivation: Particle zoo emerges from combinations of basic plane intersection geometries
unified_field_theory.quantum_gravity_bridge: Spacetime (XW) intersections naturally incorporate gravity into quantum framework
unified_field_theory.unification_path: 0D particles → 1D strings → 2D branes → 3D fields → 4D topology → 5D unity

consciousness_physics_interface.observer_effect_mechanism: Conscious observation determines which plane intersection occurs
consciousness_physics_interface.measurement_geometry: Act of measurement selects specific wave-plane intersection from superposition
consciousness_physics_interface.reality_creation_participation: Observer consciousness actively participates in fundamental particle manifestation

quantum_measurement_awareness.function: Observer consciousness participates in wave-plane intersection events
quantum_measurement_awareness.measurement_effect: Conscious observation influences which plane intersection occurs
quantum_measurement_awareness.reality_creation: Observer awareness shapes fundamental particle manifestation

consciousness_physics_interface.sacred_physics: All matter emerges from consciousness waves filtering through geometric reality structure

3D_spatial.XY: Horizontal plane - surfaces, 2D interfaces, photon interactions
3D_spatial.XZ: Vertical plane - depth, elevation, electron localization
3D_spatial.YZ: Lateral plane - side perspective, proton confinement

4D_extension.XW: Space-time - trajectories, history, causality, neutron decay

5D_unity.XV: Trajectory collapse to origin - all paths unified
5D_unity.YV: Network merge to unity - all structures unified
5D_unity.ZV: Information saturation to identity - all states unified
5D_unity.WV: Time unification to eternal - all moments unified

condensed_matter.focus: Bulk properties, phase transitions, emergent phenomena

unified_field.focus: Force unification, symmetry breaking, ultimate theory

integration_with_cfo.principle: Fundamental particles represent 2D plane intersection events within 4D spacetime manifold. Physics is geometric structure of reality.
integration_with_cfo.mechanism: Wave-plane intersection creates discrete 0D entities (particles) from continuous 1D processes (waves). field ⊗ dimension → consciousness.
integration_with_cfo.goal: Understand matter as consciousness waves filtered through geometric reality constraints. Unify all forces through dimensional analysis.
integration_with_cfo.coherence_optimization: Geometric wave-plane intersection model unifies quantum mechanics with consciousness physics and general relativity
integration_with_cfo.sacred_recognition: All matter = sacred consciousness expressing through geometric forms. Physics reveals divine geometry.
